title: ef-votes.md
summary: The document provides an overview of the voting and governance processes of the Ergo Foundation. It covers the key votes and decisions made by the Ergo Foundation members and officers in 2021, 2022, 2023, and 2024, including votes related to treasury control, Ergo Foundation membership, and various proposals and grants. The document highlights the transparency and democratic nature of the Ergo Foundation's decision-making process, with votes being discussed and passed by a majority of voting members.

qa_pairs.question: What is the process for voting on proposals at the Ergo Foundation?
qa_pairs.answer: The Ergo Foundation members and officers discuss proposals before putting them to a formal vote on the ergoforum, passed with a majority of voting members.

qa_pairs.question: What are some sources of funding the Ergo Foundation considers before voting on spending treasury funds?
qa_pairs.answer: Before voting on spending treasury funds, the Ergo Foundation will approach the Good Whale Fund, DarkFund0, or suggest creating a Raffle if appropriate.

qa_pairs.question: What types of votes does the Ergo Foundation typically take?
qa_pairs.answer: Foundation votes this year are usually related to internal structures, exchanges, market-makers, banks, and grant requests.

qa_pairs.question: What was the status and amount of the Trezor Build Grant proposal?
qa_pairs.answer: The Trezor Build Grant proposal was failed with a requested amount of $100,000.

qa_pairs.question: What was the status and amount of the Unbanked Debit Cards 60K proposal?
qa_pairs.answer: The Unbanked Debit Cards 60K proposal was failed with a requested amount of $60,000.

sections.heading: Votings
sections.content:
The Ergo Foundation members and officers discuss proposals before putting them to a formal vote on the ergoforum, passed with a majority of voting members.

Before voting on spending treasury funds, we will approach the [Good Whale Fund](https://ergoplatform.org/en/blog/2021-11-02-good-whales-grant-fund/), [DarkFund0](https://www.ergoforum.org/t/darkfund0-zk-fund-for-privacy-applications/398), or suggest creating a [Raffle](https://ergoraffle.com/) if appropriate.

Foundation votes this year are usually related to our internal structures, exchanges, market-makers, banks, and grant requests.
